description: Creates one or more Amazon Lightsail instances.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1578.002 - Modify Cloud Compute Infrastructure: Create Cloud Instance

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: CreateInstances can be used by adversaries to acquire infrastructure for future operations by provisioning new instances.
Instances could act as proxies to route malicious traffic and hide the true source of the attack.
Instances may be used to communicate with web services to facilitate command and control or data exfiltration.
Instances may be named or configured to masquerade as legitimate services or systems.
Instances can be used to stage data before exfiltration, serving as temporary storage points.

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreateInstances to rapidly deploy malicious instances, causing financial loss and resource exhaustion. The use of lightsail might not be monitored.
